title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง LI 1.3 - Trust company acting as agent of department of motor vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง LI 1.3 - Trust company acting as agent of department of motor vehicles

State Regulations

The department was asked whether it would be permissible, under the New York State Banking Law, for a trust company to act as agent of
the Department of Motor Vehicles for the purpose of issuing vehicle
registration renewals. The department responded that, in its opinion, under section
100-1 of the Banking Law it would be permissible for trust companies to engage
in such activities. DATED: January 31, 1969

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
LI 1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
